duties_responsibilities.duty: Research and identify prospective clients through internet research, cold calling, and referrals.
Make a high volume of calls per week, and follow up with clients to understand their needs.
Conduct client meetings, deliver sales presentations, and develop an understanding of client needs.
Manage the job order process and partner with internal staffing consultants to fulfill client needs.
Serve as the client's first point-of-contact during the job order process and engage in client entertaining activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
